title: Hour 1 - Bruce Smith (07-14-20)
itunes:title: Hour 1 - Bruce Smith (07-14-20)
description:
Bruce Smith talks to Dan about his recent flub up on the family feud tv show. Bruce says there is something about a clock and a buzzer that made him panic. He says that the prior conversation had been about sex and that led to his answer.
